lexUnit.name: ratify.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: give formal consent to; make officially valid

sentence.text: A Provisional International Civil Aviation Organization ( PICAO ) was created , with its seat in Montreal , to become a permanent organization when more than half the Chicago delegates had ratified the appropriate convention .
